attributes.action: Consider switching street lighting off in rural villages after midnight
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are constant efforts in place to reduce energy consumption and carbon footprints.  My proposal is:

- Reduce the number of street lights which are illuminated between 2359 and 0500.

- In turn reducing energy consumption

- In turn reducing light pollution

- Saving local councils money and therefore a possibilty to consider reducing Council Tax Bills
